tiled.mapeditor
Class MapEditor

java.lang.Object
  tiled.mapeditor.MapEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, MapChangeListener
public class MapEditor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, MapChangeListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, java.awt.event.ComponentListener

The main class for the Tiled Map Editor.

getMapView

public MapView getMapView()
Returns the map view. Currently only used by the UndoHandler to be able to order a repaint when doing an undo or redo. This should become obsolete when we add automatic repainting based on layer changes.

Returns:
the map view.
